resources.string: The camera couldn\'t be started. Restart your device and try again.
Unfortunately this app is currently not compatible with your device. \n \nDevice model: %s
This app needs all requested permissions.
This app only works with root access.

Raw Dumper v%s

Copyright © 2017 Adobe 
Link and license: http://supportdownloads.adobe.com/detail.jsp?ftpID=5474

Unfortunately, there's a known bug in the camera driver that prevents taking raw pictures with this camera :( 
 
A patched camera driver is needed in order to take raw pictures. 
The app will try to switch to another camera now.
Unfortunately, this camera is not able to take raw pictures :( \n \nThe app will try to switch to another camera now.
